roleset.name: plant seeds (or "seeds")

roles.note: Roles and usages may be metaphorical

example.name: medical usage - be careful with the 'farmer' and the 'seeds'

roleset.note: Based on Thyme data. Comparison to seed.02. Seed.02 is a member of VN classes butter-9.9 and spray-9.7. Framed by Katie.
